Don’t pay any attention to what he says. He’s a scammer who’s trying to sell customers a bill of goods. I think many people probably didn’t know so they bought a pup.
He must have sold a lot of people a pup.
He said you’d get your money back if you returned the products but he sold you a bill of goods - you never heard from him again.
Customers have been sold down the river because they were promised to have their money back but it didn’t happen
